subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Maxim Afinogenov had a goal and four assists last night to help the Buffalo Sabres remain unbeaten this season with a 9-1 rout of the visiting Philadelphia Flyers.
snippet: Maxim Afinogenov had a goal and four assists last night to help the Buffalo Sabres remain unbeaten this season with a 9-1 rout of the visiting Philadelphia Flyers.
